resources.string: TourMate
Personalized Travel Recommendations
*** Please, provide all information below ***
Are you a sea lover?
Do you have fondness for the mountain?
Do you have an interest in history?
Are you an entertainment lover?
Would you like to stay in hotel?
What type of hotel do you prefer?
Would you like to use any transportation service?
For how many days do you plan to travel?
What is your preferred destination?
What is your budget for the trip?
Do you require the assistance of a travel guide?
Do you have a preferrence between natural and man-made attractions?
Do you have a traveling partner?
Do you prefer to travel to a safer place?
Do you consider yourself a foodie?
Do you prefer to visit a place that is tourist friendly?
What is your departure location or starting point?
TourMate is a personalized travel recommendation app that helps users find the perfect destination based on their preferences and criteria
Sorry!
This place may not be the best fit for your travel needs
Best Wishes!
This place is an excellent fit for your travel needs.
